activity_name: Convert Passive Voice to Active Voice
activity_type: Select the desired tense.\nThe sentence displayed is in Passive voice.\nNow
activity_desc:
rearrange the given words below to construct the corresponding Active voice of the given sentence.
Click on Hints to view  hints.
Click on Submit to check whether the Active voice is properly constructed.
Click on Next to view the next sentence.

activity_name: Convert Active Voice to Passive Voice
activity_type: Select the desired tense.\nThe sentence displayed is in Active voice.\nNow
activity_desc:
rearrange the given words below to construct the corresponding Passive voice of the given sentence.
Click on Hints to view  hints.
Click on Submit to check whether the Passive voice is properly constructed.
Click on Next to view the next sentence.

activity_type: Select the desired tense.\nAccording to the selected tense
activity_desc:
the sentence will be displayed below.
Now select the tense to which the sentence needs to be converted.
Drag and Drop the appropriate form of the verb to complete this sentence.
Click on Hint for view hints.
Click on Submit to check whether selected form of the verb is correct.
Click on Next to view the next sentence.
drag and place the Ball at the appropriate position in the given picture of the living room.

activity_type: 1)Punctuate given direct speech sentence.\n2) Convert the punctuated sentence into its appropriate indirect speech form.

You Have to select the two sentence types. One to convert and another to be converted into.
Read the sentence of the selected type and rearrange the given words to construct correct Sentence.
Click on Hint for help.Click on Submit to check whether submitted answer is correctly constructed.
Click on Next to view next sentence.
